activate.SetAsPrimary: Set {{1}} e avea ma a'u mea muamua {{2}}
activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Filifili se fuaitau pasi e te ulufale i ai.
O se fasifuaitau faigofie e aofia ai ni nai upu e faigofie ona e manatua.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Filifili se fuaitau pasi lelei e puipuia ai lau teugatupe. Va'ai fautuaga mo nisi manatu.
activate.LogOutAndTryAgain: Saini i fafo ma Toe taumafai
activate.IfYouFeel: Afai e te lagona ua i ai se mea ua faaletonu, e mafai

authorize.TermsLabel:
Ua ou faitau ma ioe
i le {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Muamua e tatau ona e malilie i tuutuuga.

notifications.title: Fa'atagaga
notifications.prompt: E te mana'o e fa'aaga fa'ailoa? E te maua fa'afouga fa'a-taimi e uiga i mea e te fiafia iai.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Afio mai! Fa'amolemole fa'amaonia lau tuatusi imeli.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Afio mai! Fa'amaonia lau tuatusi imeli.
notifications.ForgetPass: Ei, na galo ia te oe lau fuaitau?
notifications.CompletedActivation: Ua mae'a ona fa'agaoioia tagata fa'aoga.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Ua mae'a ona fa'agaoioia tagata fa'aoga. Taumafai e saini i totonu nei.

login.title: Afio mai
login.directions: Fausia se tala, pe saini i totonu.
login.directionsNoRegister: Log in pe afai e iai sau tala.
login.resendConfirm: E te mana'o e lafo se fe'au e toe setiina lau fa'aupuga?
login.resendSuccess: Siaki mo se fe'au e toe seti ai lau fa'aupuga
login.noPassphrase: Ae e te le'i ulufale i totonu, e tatau ona e setiina se fuaitau pasi e ala i le kilikiina o le sootaga i lau feʻau faʻagaoioia.
login.notVerified: E tatau ona e tu'uina atu ia te oe se fe'au fa'agaoioi ina ia e saini ai.
login.emailExists: Na e taumafai e lesitala i lenei imeli muamua? Afai o lea, siaki lau pusameli e fa'agaoioia ai lau tala. Kiliki e toe lafo le fe'au
login.mobileExists: Na e taumafai e lesitala i lenei numera feaveaʻi muamua? Afai o lea, siaki lau SMS e faʻagaoioia ai lau tala. Kiliki e toe lafo le fe'au
login.newUser: pe fai se tala fou i lalo
login.facebookNoEmail: O lo'o misi lau fa'amatalaga facebook se tuatusi imeli fa'amaonia. Na'o le saini i le auala masani.
login.picTooltip: E mafai ona e suia lenei ata mulimuli ane

wallet.payload: Ulufale i totonu {{host}} i le taimi {{timestamp}}

alert.title: Toe fa'asino i le atotupe
alert.content: O le taimi lava e te tapunia ai lenei talanoaga, o le a ave oe i lau atotupe. A uma ona e saini, toe fo'i i le itulau lea.

setIdentifier.title: Fa'aopoopo se auala e saini ai

placeholders.identifier: ulufale i lau telefoni feavea'i # po'o le imeli

prompt.title: {{Platform}} Account
prompt.areUsing: O lo'o e fa'aogaina {{platform}} e pei o
prompt.noLongerUsing: E te le toe feso'ota'i ia {{platform}} as
